statements: UPDATE Events SET event_name='Birthday Party', event_description='Celebrate Bob's birthday', event_date='2022-08-15' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE Events SET notification_sent=true, user_id=101 WHERE event_name='Meeting';
UPDATE Events SET event_name='Birthday Party', event_description='A fun celebration', event_date='2023-05-15', notification_sent=true WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE Events SET notification_sent=false, event_description='Important meeting', user_id=5, event_date='2023-07-20', event_name='Team Meeting' WHERE event_id=2;
UPDATE events SET event_name='Event A', description='Updated description' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE notifications SET message='New message', notification_date='2022-08-01 10:00:00' WHERE notification_id=2;
UPDATE events SET description = 'New description' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE notifications SET notification_date = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE notification_id = 5;
